constituent: soul, rising cloud, two, elbow, wall, ghost, oni, drop, brains, rice field, human legs, elbow, elbow2
koohiiStory1: When you die, your SOUL either goes to the RISING CLOUDS (heaven) or to the ONI (hell, the devil).
koohiiStory2: When we die, our soul rises up in a ghostlike rising cloud of mist up to heaven (we hope) (Adapted from darg_sama,28-10-2005).
